20101213235534.000|20101213235535.000|CCO|   AND YELLOWING OF THE SKIN
20101213235535.000|20101213235536.000|CCO|            OR EYES.
20101213235536.000|20101213235537.000|CCO|     TALK WITH YOUR DOCTOR
20101213235537.000|20101213235538.000|CCO|     ABOUT YOUR MEDICINES,
20101213235538.000|20101213235539.000|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101213235539.000|20101213235540.000|CCO|   OR IF YOU HAVE HIGH FEVER,
20101213235540.000|20101213235541.000|CCO|  CONFUSION AND STIFF MUSCLES,
20101213235541.000|20101213235542.250|CCO|     TO ADDRESS A POSSIBLE
20101213235542.250|20101213235543.500|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.
20101213235543.500|20101213235544.750|CCO|     TELL YOUR DOCTOR ABOUT
20101213235544.750|20101213235546.000|CCO|  ALCOHOL USE, LIVER DISEASE,
20101213235546.000|20101213235547.250|CCO|     AND BEFORE YOU REDUCE
20101213235547.250|20101213235548.500|CCO|    OR STOP TAKING CYMBALTA.
20101213235548.500|20101213235549.750|CCO|DIZZINESS OR FAINTING MAY OCCUR

20101213235552.667|20101213235554.333|CCO|  DRY MOUTH, AND CONSTIPATION.
